author: adammurdoch
msg: <if> wasn't checking its condition.  Fixed, and added some test cases.

author: adammurdoch
msg: * Changed semantics of FileName.resolveName() with 'child' scope.
* Fixed a couple of problems in UriParser.normalise().
* Split up LocalFileNameParser into a Windows specifc parser and a generic

author: adammurdoch
msg: * Added OsFamily enumerated type, to represents OS groupings.
* Replaced all usages of Os.isFamily( String ) with Os.isFamily( OsFamily ).
* Replaced all usages of "os.name" system properties with calls to Os.isFamily().

author: adammurdoch
msg: Fix exception checking in unit tests.

msg: * Add more stuff to todo list.
